entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chesterfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:14 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -36.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 1:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -36.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -41.1°C
Wind: WNW 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 59 this morning and minus 51 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 54 this evening and minus 63 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 38.
